tool.name: miRanda
tool.command: miranda "$microrna" "$query" #if str($sc) -sc $sc #end if #if str($en) -en $en #end if -out $raw_output && python $__tool_directory__/miranda_parser.py $raw_output $tabular_output

param.name: sc
param.label: Alignment score threshold
param.help: Only alignments with score greater or equal to this value will be used for further analysis (-sc)

param.name: en
param.label: Set energy threshold to -E kcal/mol
param.help: Only alignments with energy less or equal to this value will be used for further analysis. A negative value is required for filtering to occur (-en)
